content.rendered:
Directed by Tinu Suresh Desai.

Written by Vipul K. Rawal.

Cast Akshay Kumar(Rustom Pavri). Ileana D’Cruz(Cynthia Pavri). Arjan Bajwa(Vikram Makhija). Esha Gupta(Preety Makhija). Pawan Malhotra(Senior Inspector Vincent Lobo). Sachin Khedekar(Public Prosecutor Lakshman Khangani). Usha Nadkarni(Jamnabai). Kumud Mishra(Erach Billimoria). Anang Desai(Judge Patel). Parmeet Sethi(Rear Admiral Prashant Kamath). Indraneel Bhattacharya(Capt. C P Cherian). Kanwaljeet Singh(Defense Secretary K. G. Bakshi (as Kanwaljit Singh)). Brijendra Kala(Head Constable Tukaram). Gireesh Sahdev(Lieutenant Commander Pujari). Abhay Kulkarni(Inspector Patil (Lobo’s Assistant)) . Manoj Bajpayee(Narrator). Subhasis Chakraborty(Ranjeet Das). Shubhankar Das(Bailiff). Shawn Dixon(Britisher 1). Deepak Gheewala(Bhanabhai, Vikram’s house help (as Deepak Ghewala)). Naman Gupta(Navgating Officer). Antti Hakala(Britisher 3). Ty Hurley(Britisher 2). Shonita Joshi(Slap Girl).Sharad Kelkar. Javed Khan(Navigating Officer). Mudassar Saeed Khan(Ship Crew Member). Kripal(Commissioner satnding in court during court proceedings). Alpesh Malaviya(Navy Officer). Devina Medda(Young Post Office Clerk). Bradley Wj Miller(Guy on beach).Siloo Parvez. Hiten Patel(Navy Sailor). Krupesh Patoliya(Amit). Shiva Rai(Navy Officer). Ranjan Raj(Newspaper Salesman).Vipul K. Rawal. Hitali Shah(Navy Captain’s Wife). Divya Sharma(Young Indian Lady). Harsh Dev Sharma(Jury Memeber). Shenturan(Officer). Amarjeet Singh(Towel Seller). Sammanika Singh(Rosy, receptionist in Vikram’s office). Varoon Varma(Lt. Bisht). Varun Verma(Lt Bisht). Abdul Zafar(Navy Officer Vikas K. Mishra)

Languages Hindi. English.

Producers Virender Arora. Aruna Bhatia. Shital Bhatia. Neelesh Bhatnagar. Nitin Chandrachud. Akash Chawla. Somesh Shivraj Chounde. Rahul Gandhi. Girish Johar. Arjun N. Kapoor. Ishwar Kapoor. Nitin Keni. Akshay Kumar. Ouch. Kenton Oxley. Megha Saigal. Karan Shah.

Production KriArj Entertainment. Nittin Keni Creations.
